name: Cloud Love
description:
Finished Version: Cloud Love Final Version

Created for Ludum Jam 40.

Cloud Love is a short game about a cloud that's in love with a boat.

Inputs: SPACE or MOUSE CLICK.

Credits

 - Music : Lonesome Liar Dancing Up in the Trees by We Is Shore Dedicated

http://freemusicarchive.org/music/We_Is_Shore_Dedicated/RHINOCErosesRabbit_Noose...

- SFX : http://soundbible.com/1601-Mario-Jumping.html

- Font : http://www.1001fonts.com/nathan-font.html
